projects.title: Diagnostics Via Disk
projects.reference: Samal, G.;Gourichon, S.; Gopinath, A.;et al.
projects.content: Led an international collaboration comprising engineers from France & India along with Prof.A. Gopinath, MIT to develop a novel method for detection of Covid-19 using DVD lasers.

projects.title: AI based Laser Scanner Microscope
projects.reference: Samal, G.; Krishna Gotti, V.; Gopinath, A.;et al.
projects.content: Built a special light microscope from spare DVD parts which performs Con-focal Fluorescence Microscopy. Developed an AI model for resolution enhancement.
